name: Funtoon's World HD Free
description:
Funtoon's World is amazing adventurous game with More then 25 Levels. Get Ready to enter Funtoon's World with amazing Excitement in each Level. Get Ready to face different monsters and earn as much coins as you can to get highest score.

Features
-4K Graphics used in the Game.
-25 Different Levels in the Game. (Free Version gives access to one level in each stage, Upgrade to Unlock more Levels)
-8 Different Characters available in the Game.
-Different Powers used in the Game.
-Game is Addictive in nature.
-Collect Coins and save yourself from monsters to get best score.
-Fully Tested on iMac,Macbook,Mac Mini, Other.
-Ratings & Feedback Appreciated.

Note: Free Version gives you access to One Level in each stage. You can also unlock various different characters through in-app purchase.
